summary: A group of teenagers in the desert become the prey of cannibalistic inbreds who live in the nearby hillside.
cast: Heather Conforto|Tom Nagel|Vaz Andreas|Frank Pacheco|Erica Kessler|Marie Westbrook|Thomas Downey|Crystal Napoles|Chriss Anglin|Louis Graham|Ella Holden|Justin Jones|Katayoun Dara|Leigh Scott|Brian J. Garland|Amanda Barton|Vanessa Rooke|Monique La Barr|Eva Derrek|Guillermo Francella|Mariano Martínez
title: Hillside Cannibals
